titles.title: Ships' Stores Funding Act of 1995
To repeal the requirement that ships' stores of the Navy be operated as nonappropriated fund instrumentalities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on National Security.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Readiness.

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Ships' Stores Funding Act of 1995 - Amends the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 1994 to repeal: (1) a requirement that all naval ships' stores be operated as nonappropriated fund instrumentalities by October 1, 1994; and (2) a specified transfer of funds to meet such requirement.
